programme.title: Inside the Box
programme.desc: In this game show, three contestants battle it out by answering trivia questions for a $10,000 cash prize; in each of the first two rounds, each contestant gets a turn in The Box, a TV-shaped booth, with the other two contestants outside the booth.

programme.title: Inside the Box

programme.title: Inside the Box
programme.desc: In this game show, three contestants battle it out by answering TV trivia questions for a $10,000 cash prize. In each of the first two rounds, each contestant gets a turn in The Box, a TV-shaped booth, with the other two contestants outside the booth. The contestant in The Box is given a series of questions while the "outside The Box" contestants are given the correct answers. The contestant in the booth asks the other contestants yes or no questions to try to determine the correct answers to the questions being asked. The player with the best score at the end of the second round advances to the final round. In the final round, the contestant asks host Sam Kalilieh yes or no questions in an attempt to correctly answer the question. A correct answer wins the contestant money, based on how long it takes to give the correct answer.

programme.title: Ice Cold Cash
programme.desc: Hailey and Sarah's stress levels rise as the winnings get bigger; Laura and Tracey get the crowd excited with their contagious excitement; Sheldon and Julia don't drink bourbon so they must answer with a guess.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: Unassuming people enter a taxi cab as simple passengers taking a normal ride, only to be shocked when they discover that they're instant contestants. The host, Adam Grove, asks the passengers trivia questions as he escorts them to their destination.
